name: Escape The Lab (itch) (CPSuperstore)
description:
Escape The Lab - PLEASE READ THIS -

Created by CPSuperstore in the Fang Engine.

Note that this game is a tech demo of the Fang Engine to prove what the engine is capable of.

If you have feedback, I would love to hear it. While this game is more of a tech demo for the engine, knowing how to make the next game even better would help a lot.

CONTROLS:

  • Look left and right - move mouse cursor
  • Interact - left click
  • Toggle flashlight - right click
  • View map - Press 'M' or 'Escape'

Note that you can not interact with the high-tech looking machines in the lab.

Also note that this game does NOT save your progress. If you close the game at any point, all progress will be lost.

If you like what you see, join our Discord Server:

https://discord.gg/CxbPp9yzju

SPECIAL THANKS to the following people:

  • Victoria R. - Beta Tester
  • Jeffrey L.  - Voice Actor
  • MelchyMelch - First person to Stream the game on Twitch

For the best experience, please go in blind.

THERE IS NO WAY OUT

If you would like, you can leave a donation to help keep development of the engine and other games going. Any donations are greatly appreciated.

You can leave donations at https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=6EA6SGLMSN5UJ
